title: Mother's Love Bottle - Artistic Hand-Painted Glass
subtitle: Artistic hand-painted glass bottle
description: This exquisite hand-painted glass bottle, titled 'Mother's Love', is a masterpiece of craftsmanship. Each stroke tells a story of affection and care, making it a perfect gift or a centerpiece for your home decor. The vibrant colors are sealed for durability, ensuring the art remains as vivid as the day it was created.

title: Twin Pack Bottles - Elegant Home Decor Set
subtitle: Elegant set for home decor
description: Elevate your home aesthetics with this elegant twin pack of hand-painted bottles. Designed to complement each other, these pieces bring a touch of sophisticated artistry to any shelf or mantelpiece. Hand-crafted with premium pigments on high-quality glass.

title: Standard Bottle Art - Classic Collection Piece
subtitle: Classic collection piece
description: A cornerstone of our collection, this standard bottle features classic hand-painted motifs that celebrate traditional artistry. Versatile and timeless, it fits seamlessly into both modern and traditional interiors.

title: Premium Design Bottle - Exquisite Craftmanship
subtitle: Exquisite craftmanship
description: Our premium design bottle is the epitome of exquisite craftsmanship. Featuring intricate details and a vibrant palette, this piece is designed for those who appreciate the finer things in life. Each bottle is uniquely hand-painted by master artisans.

title: Tinted Black Bottle - Modern Artistic Finish
subtitle: Modern artistic finish
description: Sleek, modern, and undeniably artistic. Our tinted black bottle features a sophisticated finish that serves as the perfect canvas for contemporary hand-painted designs. A bold statement piece for any room.

title: Jagannath Wall Art - Traditional Circular Cut
subtitle: Traditional circular cut design
description: Bring divine energy into your home with this traditional Jagannath wall art. Hand-painted on a unique circular wood cut, this piece captures the essence of spiritual heritage with vibrant colors and meticulous detailing.

title: Ganesha Standard Bottle - Spiritual Art
subtitle: Spiritual hand-painted art
description: Celebrate spirituality with this hand-painted Ganesha bottle. The deity of wisdom and beginnings is beautifully rendered in vibrant hues, making this bottle a meaningful addition to your spiritual corner or a thoughtful gift.

title: The Woman Premium - Detailed Figurative Painting
subtitle: Detailed figurative painting
description: A stunning tribute to femininity through detailed figurative painting. This premium piece features complex layers and a rich color palette, showcasing the artist's ability to capture depth and emotion on glass.

title: 3-Layer Wall Hanging - Multi-tier Decoration
subtitle: Multi-tier home decoration
description: A dynamic 3-layer wall hanging that adds vertical interest and artistic flair to your walls. Each tier is hand-painted with coordinating designs, creating a cohesive and eye-catching decorative piece.

title: Subh Labh Hanging - Auspicious Festive Decor
subtitle: Auspicious festive decor
description: Invoke prosperity and goodwill with this auspicious Subh Labh 3-layer hanging. Perfect for entrances or prayer rooms, this piece combines traditional symbolism with contemporary hand-painted artistry.

title: Padma Lotus Art - Serene Circular Floral Design
subtitle: Serene circular floral design
description: The Padma (Lotus) symbolizes purity and serenity. This hand-painted circular cut piece brings a calming floral atmosphere to your home, executed with delicate brushwork and a soft, soothing color palette.

title: Ganesha Circular Cut - Intricate Board Craft
subtitle: Intricate wood/board craft
description: This intricate Ganesha circular cut combines traditional woodworking with master-level hand painting. The result is a high-relief effect that adds texture and depth to the spiritual art piece.

title: The Bloom Square - Vibrant Floral Wall Piece
subtitle: Vibrant floral wall piece
description: A vibrant celebration of nature, 'The Bloom' features bold floral motifs on a modern square format. The hand-painted details are rich and textured, making it a standout addition to any gallery wall.

title: Parvati Shiv Art - Divine Couple Portrait
subtitle: Divine couple circular portrait
description: A divine portrait of Parvati and Shiv, hand-painted on a circular base. This piece captures the celestial harmony and spiritual depth of the divine couple through exquisite detailing and meaningful color symbolism.

title: Krishna Square Art - Ethereal Devotional Painting
subtitle: Ethereal devotional painting
description: Experience the ethereal beauty of Krishna through this devotional square painting. The artist uses a delicate touch to portray the playful yet profound nature of the deity, perfect for creating a peaceful sanctuary in your home.
